If you had the first one and moved to the 2nd one, it's worth the move . The same exact 16 gig wifi sells for about $150 less at places like Best Buy and Apple's own website . There is still no SD Slot, no Thunderbolt support however the battery still holds a charge ( I just charged mine for the first time last night)

The screen lifts off and was wiggling when I was holding it for the first time . Scratches and cracks everywhere, it has definitely been dropped, maybe a child's toy even . The speaker is blown so we have to replace it and it made for a lousy birthday . The charger they gave me is a lightning cable but the iPad takes the old school kind .

The iPad is extremely slow for a 32 gb (my old 16 gb at full capactity was faster) There seems to be a fault with the control button which is very unresponsive and when the screen goes off, it takes a while for it to come back on . The software is outdated and the home bottom is broken .

The charger that came with it was complete JUNK!! It didn't last 24 hours. Be prepared to buy another charger for this. It works but I didn't receive a charger for it like it was promised an it has 16% when I got it  an its dinged up. Just an old iPad that is old to old to work and can't be updated due to apple support .

If you had the first one and moved to the 2nd one, it's worth the move . The same exact 16 gig wifi sells for about $150 less at places like Best Buy and Apple's own website . It does feel speedier when loading up apps and as far as gaming goes, some like Infinity Blade and Shadow Guardian really gets a boost from the extra speed . There is still no SD Slot, no Thunderbolt support however the battery still holds a charge .

Shipped the same day I bought it! Looks brand new . Shipped very fast and was just like it said . Comes with nice hard case  I love it it was a cheap price and Iam glad I brought it. It does occasionally freeze,  and sometimes arbitrarily returns to the home screen . The only thing that sucks is that the charger doesn't stay in and falls out easily .
